gold.user: User requests to list all IP addresses associated with a specific SIP IP Access Control List.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of IP addresses in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to add a new IP address to the specified SIP IP Access Control List.
gold.ideal: Creates a new IP address entry and returns the details of the created IP address.

gold.user: User needs to fetch details of a specific IP address by its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified IP address in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to update the details of an existing IP address.
gold.ideal: Updates the IP address information and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User intends to remove a specific IP address from the SIP IP Access Control List.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the IP address and returns a confirmation message.
